_description: A series of couplets used as headings in a prognosticatory calenda

BodAsh8.First Lines: þys rewle ys godefor lettynge of blod…
BodAsh8.Last Lines:
…þys for iug … hosbond & wy…& for to
                    lyue gode lyfe
BodAsh8.Note: 8 lines on the top of a piece of vellum, much faded.
